title: Shaco is surrounded by the enemy team.
body:
They know which one is the real once since he has red buff.

Use Janna's shield on his clone and /laugh because this Shaco has been a prick all game. Cussed out top when he got himself caught invading.

Enemy team instantly switches focus to clone and Shaco gets away.

"wp janna"

Anyone else have tales similar to this?
